item.title: An Old William Lane Craig Debate
item.description:
Whilst browsing at some William Lane Craig videos yesterday, I came across this debate that I had not seen before.

It is from 1998 and he is debating with Dr. Keith Parsons, a now retired Professor of Philosophy and a non-believer.
